info.title: PINS Back Office Appeals API
info.description: PINS Back Office Appeals API documentation from Swagger

get.description: Gets requested appeals, limited to the first 30 appeals if no pagination params are given

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The pagination page number, required if pageSize is given

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The pagination page size, required if pageNumber is given
